product_name: NiteRider Solas USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: NiteRider Solas USB is a rear safety light featuring a powerful, 2-watt LED that's so bright it's even noticable during the day. When it's time to recharge just plug it into your computer's USB port.
short_description: NiteRider Solas USB is a rear safety light featuring a powerful, 2-watt LED that's so bright it's even noticable during the day. When it's time to recharge just plug it into your computer's USB port.
